ai-tha-ap524:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap524:1.3_0: I’ve given up even a single word,
ai-tha-ap524:2.3_0: being attached to beds and benches,
ai-tha-ap524:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap524:3.2_0: I was rugged me by saying
ai-tha-ap524:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap524:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap524:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap524:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable Dīghāvu.
ai-tha-ap524:8.1_0: for the senior monks, the second part of the senior monks,
